participant_1.background:
I like to look my best even when I'm at work.
I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need.
I love listening to Tool while I'm working on my stamp collection and taking care of my dogs.
I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.
i am 21 years old.

participant_2.background:
I rode my bike 100 miles and ate a big bowl of chili afterwards.
I go on long walks with my dogs to keep fit.
i m taking online classes.
i graduated with a business degree , and marketing is all that i really enjoyed.
I'm not sure if I have a favorite color to dye my hair, but I've been experimenting with different colors lately.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just finished a long bike ride and I'm about to eat a big bowl of chili.
That sounds delicious! I'm just getting started on my day. I'm going to be working on some drawings and painting.
That sounds like fun! I love to draw and paint too. I used to do it all the time when I was younger, but I haven't had much time for it lately.
I know what you mean. It's hard to find the time to do everything you want to do.
Yeah, but it's worth it when you can finally sit down and create something beautiful.
I agree! I love the feeling of seeing your work come to life.
Me too! What kind of things do you like to draw and paint?
I like to draw animals and landscapes. I also like to paint abstract paintings.
Those sound great! I love animals too, so I'd love to see some of your drawings.
Sure! I'll send you some pictures later.
Awesome! I can't wait to see them.
